tables.Title: tables
tables.Desc: Creates a set of empty record tables, which can be used with db.merge.
tables.SummaryLine: Creates a set of empty record tables, which can be used with db.merge.
Examples:
local DbsSchema = dbs.init{filename='table.dbs'}
function main(Data)
   local TableSet = DbsSchema:tables('ADT')
end

local DbsSchema = dbs.init{definition='table Patient (Id string, FirstName string, LastName string, Gender string, key(Id));'}
function main(Data)
   local TableSet = DbsSchema:tables()
end
tables.Returns: The set of empty record tables <u>table_collection node tree</u>.

SeeAlso.Title: The db_connection module - new database methods
Node types for Iguana node trees
